projector_ip.description: IP of a JVC projector supporting control over Ethernet based IP.

projector_password.description: Optional network password for JVC projector.

python_path.description: Path to python for invoking JVC IP API. Default is '/usr/bin/python'.

poll_interval.description: Polling interval in seconds for the power state. Default is 3.

connection_delay_interval.description: Delay in seconds between consecutive connections to the projector. Default is 1.
